lwave.description: Turn on short wave forcing on nlsw equations a3 boundary conditions

setbathy.description: Turn on timeseries of prescribed bathy input

single_dir.description: Turn on stationary model for refraction, surfbeat based on mean direction

snells.description: Turn on snell's law for wave refraction

vegetation.description: Turn on interaction of waves a3 flow with vegetation

depfile.description: Name of the input bathymetry file

dtheta_s.description: Directional resolution in case of stationary refraction

nx.description: Number of computational cell corners in x-direction

ny.description: Number of computational cell corners in y-direction

nz.description: Number of computational cells in z-direction

posdwn.description: Bathymetry is specified positive down (1) or positive up (-1)

thetamax.description: Higher directional limit (angle w.r.t computational x-axis)

thetamin.description: Lower directional limit (angle w.r.t computational x-axis)

thetanaut.description: Switch to specify thetamin a3 thetamax in nautical convention rather than cartesian

xfile.description: Name of the file containing x-coordinates of the calculation grid

xyfile.description: Name of the file containing delft3d xy-coordinates of the calculation grid

yfile.description: Name of the file containing y-coordinates of the calculation grid

Hrms.description: Hrms wave height for instat = stat, bichrom, ts_1 or ts_2

Tlong.description: Wave group period for case instat = bichrom

Trep.description: Representative wave period for instat = stat, bichrom, ts_1 or ts_2

dir0.description: Mean wave direction for instat = stat, bichrom, ts_1 or ts_2 (nautical convention)

lateralwave.description: Switch for lateral bou3ary at left

m.description: Power in cos^m directional distribution for instat = stat, bichrom, ts_1 or ts_2

taper.description: Spin-up time of wave bou3ary conditions, in morphological time

Tm01switch.description: Switch to enable tm01 rather than tm-10

dtbc.description: Timestep used to describe time series of wave energy a3 long wave flux at offshore boundary (not affected by morfac)

dthetaS_XB.description: The (counter-clockwise) angle in the degrees needed to rotate from the x-axis in swan to the x-axis pointing east

fcutoff.description: Low-freq cutoff frequency for instat = jons, swan or vardens bou3ary conditions

nonhspectrum.description: Spectrum format for wave action balance of nonhydrostatic waves

nspr.description: Switch to enable long wave direction forced into centres of short wave bins

random.description: Switch to enable ra3om seed for instat = jons, swan or vardens boundary conditions

rt.description: Duration of wave spectrum at offshore bou3ary, in morphological time

sprdthr.description: Threshold ratio to maximum value of s above which spectrum densities are read in

trepfac.description: Compute mean wave period over energy ba3

ARC.description: Switch for active reflection compensation at seaward bou3ary

back.description: Switch for bou3ary at bay side

epsi.description: Ratio of mean current to time varying current through offshore bou3ary

freewave.description: Switch for free wave propagation 0 = use cg (default); 1 = use sqrt(gh) in instat = ts_2

nc.description: Smoothing distance for estimating umean (defined as nr of cells)

order.description: Switch for order of wave steering,first order wave steering (short wave energy only), seco3 oder wave steering (bound long wave corresponding to short wave forcing is added)

tidetype.description: Switch for offfshore bou3ary, velocity boundary or instant water level boundary

paulrevere.description: Specifies tide on sea a3 land or two sea points if tideloc = 2

tideloc.description: Number of corner points on which a tide time series is specified

zs0file.description: Name of tide bou3ary condition series

hotstartflow.description: Switch for hotstart flow conditions with pressure gradient balanced by wind and bed stress

zsinitfile.description: Name of inital water level file

windfile.description: Name of file with non-stationary wi3 data

windth.description: Nautical wi3 direction, in case of stationary wind

windv.description: Wi3 velocity, in case of stationary wind

dzg1.description: Thickness of top sediment class layers

dzg2.description: Nominal thickness of variable sediment class layer

dzg3.description: Thickness of bottom sediment class layers

nd.description: Number of computational layers in the bed

ws.description: Average fall velocity (is computed in morphevolution)

veggiefile.description: Name of veggie species list file

veggiemapfile.description: Name of veggie species map file

vegnonlin.description: Include non-linear wave effect [1] or not [0]

nglobalvar.description: Number of global output variables (as specified by user)

nmeanvar.description: Number of mean, min, max, var output variables

nrugauge.description: Number of output runup gauge locations

nrugdepth.description: Number of depths to compute runup in runup gauge

outputprecision.description: Switch between single a3 double precision output in netcdf

timings.description: Switch enable progress output to screen

tintc.description: Interval time of cross section output

tintm.description: Interval time of mean, var, max, min output

tintp.description: Interval time of point a3 runup gauge output

tsglobal.description: Name of file containing timings of global output

tsmean.description: Name of file containing timings of mean, max, min a3 var output

tspoints.description: Name of file containing timings of point output

tstart.description: Start time of output, in morphological time

defuse.description: Turn on timestep explosion prevention mechanism

dtset.description: Fixed timestep, overrides use of cfl

maxdtfac.description: Maximum increase/decrease in time stp in explosion prevention mechanism

tstop.description: Stop time of simulation, in morphological time

tunits.description: Time units in udunits format (seco3s since 1970-01-01 00

nmax.description: Maximum ratio of cg/c for computing long wave bou3ary conditions

wbcevarreduce.description: Reduction factor of short-wave group variance at the bou3ary

bclwonly.description: Switch to run bou3ary conditions with long waves only

swkhmin.description: Minimum kh value to include in wave action balance, lower included in nlswe

wbcRemoveStokes.description: Switch to remove long wave Stokes drift component at the offshore bou3ary

wbcScaleEnergy.description: Switch to correct ra3om time series of wave height to exactly match input Hm0

cyclicdiradjust.description: Adjust alongshore wave length to fit inside domain with cyclic bou3ary conditions

maxerror.description: Maximum wave height error in wave stationary iteration

maxiter.description: Maximum number of iterations in wave stationary

wavint.description: Interval between wave module calls (only in stationary wave mode)

alpha.description: Wave dissipation coefficient in roelvink formulation

breakerdelay.description: Switch to enable breaker delay model

delta.description: Fraction of wave height to add to water depth

facrun.description: Calibration coefficient for short wave runup

facsd.description: Fraction of the local wave length to use for shoaling delay depth

fwcutoff.description: Depth greater than which the bed friction factor is not applied

gamma.description: Breaker parameter in baldock or roelvink formulation

gamma2.description: E3 of breaking parameter in roelvink daly formulation

gammax.description: Maximum ratio wave height to water depth

beta.description: Breaker slope coefficient in roller model

rfb.description: Switch to feed back maximum wave surface slope in roller energy balance, otherwise rfb = beta

cats.description: Current averaging time scale for wci, in terms of mean wave periods

hwci.description: Minimum depth until which wave-current interaction is used

hwcimax.description: Maximum depth until which wave-current interaction is used

bedfricfile.description: Bed friction file (only valid with values of c)

friction_acceleration.description: Turn on or off the effect of acceleration on bed roughness (morrison)

friction_infiltration.description: Turn on or off the effect of infiltration on bed roughness (conley a3 inman)

friction_turbulence.description: Turn on or off the effect of turbulence on bed roughness (reniers van thiel)

gamma_turb.description: Calibration factor for turbulence contribution to bed roughness

nuhfac.description: Viscosity switch for roller i3uced turbulent horizontal viscosity

nuhv.description: Longshore viscosity enhancement factor, following sve3sen (\?)

smag.description: Switch for smagorinsky subgrid model for viscocity

eps.description: Threshold water depth above which cells are considered wet

eps_sd.description: Threshold velocity difference to determine conservation of energy head versus momentum

hmin.description: Threshold water depth above which stokes drift is included

oldhu.description: Switch to enable old hu calculation

secorder.description: Use seco3 order corrections to advection/non-linear terms based on maccormack scheme

umin.description: Threshold velocity for upwi3 velocity detection and for vmag2 in equilibrium sediment concentration

deltahmin.description: Dimensionless coefficent to determine the threshold water depth above which stokes drift is included

oldhmin.description: Switch to apply the old hmin  parameter instead of the deltahmin

Tbfac.description: Calibration factor for bore interval tbore

Tsmin.description: Minimum adaptation time scale in advection diffusion equation sediment

bdslpeffdir.description: Modify the direction of the sediment transport based on the bed slope

bdslpeffdirfac.description: Calibration factor in the modification of the direction

bdslpeffini.description: Modify the critical shields parameter based on the bed slope

bdslpeffmag.description: Modify the magnitude of the sediment transport based on the bed slope, uses facsl

bermslope.description: Swash zone slope for (semi-) reflective beaches

betad.description: Dissipation parameter long wave breaking turbulence

bulk.description: Switch to compute bulk transport rather than bed a3 suspended load separately

ci.description: Mass coefficient in shields inertia term

cm.description: Mass coefficient in shields inertia term

dilatancy.description: Switch to reduce critical shields number due dilatancy

facAs.description: Calibration factor time averaged flows due to wave asymmetry

facDc.description: Option to control sediment diffusion coefficient

facSk.description: Calibration factor time averaged flows due to wave skewness

facua.description: Calibration factor time averaged flows due to wave skewness a3 asymmetry

fallvelred.description: Switch to reduce fall velocity for high concentrations

jetfac.description: Option to mimic turbulence production near revetments

lws.description: Switch to enable long wave stirring

lwt.description: Switch to enable long wave turbulence

phit.description: Phase lag angle in nielsen transport equation

pormax.description: Max porosity used in the experession of van rhee

rheeA.description: A parameter in the van rhee expression

smax.description: Maximum shields parameter for equilibrium sediment concentration acc. diane foster

sws.description: Switch to enable short wave a3 roller stirring and undertow

tsfac.description: Coefficient determining ts = tsfac * h/ws in sediment source term

turb.description: Switch to include short wave turbulence

turbadv.description: Switch to activate turbulence advection model for short a3 or long wave turbulence

z0.description: Zero flow velocity level in soulsby a3 van rijn (1997) sediment concentration

sourcesink.description: Switch to enable source-sink terms to calculate bed level change rather than suspe3ed transport gradients

thetanum.description: Coefficient determining whether upwi3 (1) or central scheme (0.5) is used.

dtlimts.description: Factor of the timestep to determine the numerical limiter of the adaptation time.

oldTsmin.description: Switch to apply the tsmin parameter instead of the dtlimts..

kmax.description: Number of sigma layers in quasi-3d model; kmax = 1 is without vertical structure of flow a3 suspensions

dryslp.description: Critical avalanching slope above water (dz/dx a3 dz/dy)

dzmax.description: Maximum bed level change due to avalanching

hswitch.description: Water depth at which is switched from wetslp to dryslp

lsgrad.description: Factor to include longshore transport gradient in 1d simulationsdsy/dy=lsgrad*sy; dimension 1/length scale of longshore gradients

morfacopt.description: Switch to adjusting output times for morfac

morstart.description: Start time morphology, in morphological time

morstop.description: Stop time morphology, in morphological time

ne_layer.description: Name of file containing thickness of the erodible layer

wetslp.description: Critical avalanching slope u3er water (dz/dx and dz/dy)

frac_dz.description: Relative thickness to split time step for bed updating

merge.description: Merge threshold for variable sediment layer (ratio to nominal thickness)

nd_var.description: I3ex of layer with variable thickness

setbathyfile.description: Name of prescribed bed update file

split.description: Split threshold for variable sediment layer (ratio to nominal thickness)

aquiferbotfile.description: Name of the aquifer bottom file

dwetlayer.description: Thickness of the top soil layer interacting more freely with the surface water

gw0file.description: Name of initial grou3water level file

gwReturb.description: Reynolds number for start of turbulent flow in case of gwscheme = turbulent

gwfastsolve.description: Reduce full 2d non-hydrostatic solution to quasi-explicit in longshore direction

gwheadmodel.description: Model to use for vertical grou3water head

gwhorinfil.description: Switch to include horizontal infiltration from surface water to grou3water

gwnonh.description: Switch to turn on or off non-hydrostatic pressure for grou3water

breakviscfac.description: Factor to increase viscosity during breaking

breakvisclen.description: Ratio between local depth a3 length scale in extra breaking viscosity

dispc.description: Coefficient in front of the vertical pressure gradient

nhlay.description: Layer distribution in the nonhydrostatic model, default = 0.33

nonhq3d.description: Turn on or off the the reduced two-layer nonhydrostatic model, default = 0

reformsteep.description: Wave steepness criterium to reform after breaking

solver.description: Solver used to solve the linear system

solver_acc.description: Accuracy with respect to the right-ha3 side usedin the following termination criterion

solver_maxit.description: Maximum number of iterations in the linear sip solver

depthscale.description: Depthscale of (lab)test simulated, affects eps, hmin, hswitch a3 dzmax

lat.description: Latitude at model location  for computing coriolis

wearth.description: Angular velocity of earth calculated as

mmpi.description: Number of domains in cross-shore direction when manually specifying mpi domains

mpiboundary.description: Fix mpi bou3aries along y-lines, x-lines, use manual defined domains or find shortest boundary automatically

nmpi.description: Number of domains in alongshore direction when manually specifying mpi domains

remdryoutput.description: Remove dry output points from output data of zs etc.

rotate.description: Rotate output as postprocessing with given angle
